name: My Desktop Alive
description: Choose your composition and watch your desktop come alive with a whole bunch of animals, plants, dinosaurs and robots. Let them roam free, enjoy their company, interact or let them be. Minimal or crazy packed, your desktop is both your playground and your zen garden.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2 GB Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.4 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2 GB Storage: 600 MB available space
